casebody.data:
JAMES CARLISLE BASKIN v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45522] [95 C. Cls. 455;

316 U. S. —]

Bight to sue for salary where employment was terminated on charges.

Decided January 5, 1942; petition dismissed. Ante, p. 455.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court April 27, 1942.
